response.overview: While mourning his best friend Yayat, Bagas meets him again as a spirit. Thrilled with excitement, they catch up with each other. Until Bagas remembersâ€”last time he saw Yayat, they were not on very good terms. However, like usual, Yayat persuades Bagas to go to his favorite place, the beach. That made Bagas think of something..
response.title: Lu Sahabat Gua
